com.nexmo.client.account

Class AccountClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.client.account.AccountClient

  • public class AccountClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A client for talking to the Nexmo Number Insight API. The standard way to obtain an instance of this class is to use NexmoClient.getInsightClient().
